t:test_case.t:steps: 1.Admin login 2.Create test account 3.Use lmtp inject to inject the message

t:test_case.t:objective: Login as the test account to get message Ids
t:test_case.t:steps: 1. Login to the account. 2. Search a mail to get the message-id

t:test_case.t:objective: Forward the mails that are in different folders
Verify that a search for flagged mail with respect to receiving time is successful
Verify that a search for unflagged mails with respect to receiving time is successful
Verify that a search for read mail with respect to receiving time is successful
Verify that a search for unread mails with respect to receiving time is successful
Verify that a search for reply mail with respect to receiving time is successful
Verify that a search for forward mails with respect to receiving mail is successful
Verify that a search for flagged mail with respect to receiving time is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for unflagged mails with respect to receiving time is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for read mail with respect to receiving time is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for unread mails with respect to receiving time is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for reply mail with respect to receiving time is successful (for conversation)
Verify that a search for forward mails with respect to receiving time is successful (for conversation)
